alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 09 at 10:43AM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Monday. For the High Wind Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains
